data.name: admeowture
data.detailed_description:
This is a "war" about cats, or just an ordinary game.

Players only need to shake a drink bottle, press and hold the left mouse button to accumulate power and throw it to other cats.

You can make the opponent fall into an abnormal state. You can get the enemy's props by "touching and killing out" the enemy with the last blow.



At the same time, you can also collect dried fish, gold coins and other props from the map. Exchange what you need with the cats in the town.

Increase your combat effectiveness until you save your "excrement shoveling officer"“
data.about_the_game:
This is a "war" about cats, or just an ordinary game.

Players only need to shake a drink bottle, press and hold the left mouse button to accumulate power and throw it to other cats.

You can make the opponent fall into an abnormal state. You can get the enemy's props by "touching and killing out" the enemy with the last blow.



At the same time, you can also collect dried fish, gold coins and other props from the map. Exchange what you need with the cats in the town.

Increase your combat effectiveness until you save your "excrement shoveling officer"“
data.short_description: This is a third person shooting game. Players just need to hold down the mouse and let go. Throw out the synthetic drink and you can play. Right click to knock down the cats in an abnormal state, and you can take food from them. Then we'll have a delicious meal.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 6100 or AMD FX-4350
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GT 1030, 2GB (Legacy: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460), AMD RX550, 2GB (Legacy: AMD Radeon HD 6850), Integrated: Intel HD Graphics 630
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 至少是台电脑吧
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 6600 or AMD Ryzen 1600x
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1060, 3 GB (Legacy: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 780, 4GB) or AMD RX 580, 4 GB (Legacy: AMD R9 290X, 4GB)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 至少能开网页小游戏吧
